title: Critical Thinking and Clinical Judgment Competency Enhancement Workshop in Healthcare

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and clinical case analysis experience
context.additional_context: Classrooms equipped with digital devices (tablets/laptops) and team-based learning spaces are necessary.

learning_goals: Through analysis of real clinical scenarios, over 85% of learners can present problem-solving solutions applying critical thinking frameworks (SCAMPER, Six-Hat Thinking).
In diverse patient case studies, 90% of learners can perform structured decision-making using clinical judgment tools (SOAP notes, SBAR).
In team-based discussions, 80% of learners can present medical judgment rationales applying Evidence-Based Practice principles.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
